TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AppSettingsExpressionEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor

summary.span: 提供屬性和方法，用於在設計階段評估和編輯組態檔中的應用程式設定運算式。

span.span: Provides properties and methods for evaluating and editing an application setting expression in a configuration file at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別，並提供用於評估和關聯的控制項屬性中的應用程式設定參考，在設計階段實作。The class is derived from the class and provides an implementation for evaluating and associating an application setting reference with a control property at design time. 例如，將控制項屬性的值繫結至應用程式設定運算式`AppSettings:mySettingKeyName`，表示控制項屬性值已設定使用`mySettingKeyName`值`appSettings`Web 組態檔區段。For example, you can bind the value of a control property to the application setting expression `AppSettings:mySettingKeyName`, which indicates that the control property value is set using the `mySettingKeyName` value in the `appSettings` section of the Web configuration file. 視覺化設計工具裝載，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，會使用類別，以選取 從應用程式設定`appSettings`組態區段，然後判斷設計階段呈現選取的運算式。A visual designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the class to select an application setting from the `appSettings` configuration section, and then evaluates the selected expression for design-time rendering. 當您瀏覽至屬性在設計階段屬性方格控制項的視覺化設計工具會顯示一個對話方塊來提供執行階段值的控制項屬性的集合運算式。When you browse to the property for a control in the design-time properties grid, the visual designer displays a dialog box to set expressions that provide the run-time value for a control property. 您可以選取清單運算式前置字元為基礎的運算式型別。You can select the expression type based on a list of expression prefixes. 當您選取**AppSettings**運算式前置字元，從清單中，視覺化設計工具主應用程式會使用相關聯物件來提供設計階段編輯功能`appSettings`運算式，並使用方法評估並轉換成運算式字串為基礎的應用程式設定運算式的語法。When you select the **AppSettings** expression prefix from the list, the visual designer host uses the associated object to provide design-time editing functionality of `appSettings` expressions and uses methods to evaluate and convert the expression string based on the syntax for an application setting expression. 視覺化設計工具主應用程式可用於評估的運算式結果指派控制項的設計介面上所呈現的屬性值。The visual designer host uses the evaluated expression result to assign control property values that are rendered on the design surface. 屬性物件傳回的字串`AppSettings`。The property for an object returns the string `AppSettings`. 類別是運算式前置詞相關聯`AppSettings`和實作。The class is associated with the expression prefix `AppSettings` and the implementation. 方法評估輸入應用程式設定運算式字串。The method evaluates an input application setting expression string. 方法會傳回用來輸入及編輯應用程式設定運算式的實作。The method returns the implementation that is used to enter and edit application setting expressions. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將繫結屬性控制項加入應用程式設定運算式使用物件。The following code example demonstrates how to bind the property of a control to an application setting expression using the object. 1. 在 Web Form 專案中，加入`MyHyperLinkSetting`至``web.config 檔案區段。In a Web Forms project, add `MyHyperLinkSetting` to the `` section of the web.config file. [!code-xml[ControlsUsingExpressions#5](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/Common/controlsusingexpressions.xml#5)] 2. 在 Web Form 頁面上，新增控制項。On a Web Forms page, add a control. 3. 如`Hyperlink`控制項，在內容中，按一下**運算式**，然後按一下省略符號按鈕 (**...**).For the `Hyperlink` control, in Properties, click **Expressions**, and then click the ellipsis button (**...**). ``**運算式** 對話方塊隨即出現。The ``**Expression** dialog box appears. 4. 在下**可繫結屬性**，按一下**NavigateUrl**，請在**運算式型別**清單中，按一下**AppSettings**，然後在**運算式內容**，請在**AppSetting**方塊中，輸入**MyHyperLinkSetting**。Under **Bindable properties**, click **NavigateUrl**, in the **Expression type** list, click **AppSettings**, and then under **Expression properties**, in the **AppSetting** box, type **MyHyperLinkSetting**. 視覺化設計工具使用指派的運算式`NavigateUrl`屬性。The visual designer uses the to assign the expression for the `NavigateUrl` property. 下列的 aspx 原始碼顯示使用應用程式設定運算式設定屬性值的範例。The following aspx source shows an example of a property value set using an application setting expression. [!code-aspx-csharp[ControlsUsingExpressions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/CS/controlsusingexpressionscs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[ControlsUsingExpressions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/VB/controlsusingexpressionsvb.aspx#2)] [!code-xml[ControlsUsingExpressions#2](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/Common/controlsusingexpressions.xml#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體類別基底類別，連同設定屬性設定為`AppSettings`。An instance of the class is configured by the base class together with the property set to `AppSettings`.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EvaluateExpression (string expression, object parseTimeData, Type propertyType, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EvaluateExpression(string expression, object parseTimeData, class System.Type propertyType, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function EvaluateExpression (expression As String, parseTimeData As Object, propertyType As Type, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ EvaluateExpression(System::String ^ expression, System::Object ^ parseTimeData, Type ^ propertyType, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);

param.name: expression
param.span: 要評估的應用程式設定運算式字串。

span.span: An application setting expression string to evaluate.

param.span: expression 不包含 運算式前置字元。

span.span: expression does not include the expression prefix.

param.name: parseTimeData
param.span: 包含用於評估 expression 之其他剖析資訊的物件。

span.span: An object containing additional parsing information for evaluating expression.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 服務提供者實作，由設計工具主應用程式 (Designer Host) 提供，可以用來取得額外的設計階段服務。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.

summary.span: 評估應用程式設定運算式字串，並提供控制項屬性的設計階段值。

span.span: Evaluates an application setting expression string and provides the design-time value for a control property.

returns.span: 如果運算式評估成功，則為 所參考的物件，否則為 。

span.span: The object referenced by , if the expression evaluation succeeded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會查詢所指定的應用程式設定`expression`，然後傳回應用程式設定的值。The method looks up the application setting that is specified by `expression`, and then returns the value of the application setting. 視覺化設計工具使用方法來評估應用程式設定運算式，並提供設計階段相關聯的控制項屬性值。The visual designer uses the method to evaluate an application setting expression and provide the design-time value for an associated control property. 在視覺化設計工具呼叫運算式字串與評估的運算式會以指派控制項的設計介面上所呈現的屬性值結果的使用方法。The visual designer calls the method with the expression string, and uses the evaluated expression result to assign control property values that are rendered on the design surface. 在執行階段，頁面剖析器會使用和方法對應實作，以評估運算式，並提供執行階段相關聯的控制項屬性值。At run time, the page parser uses the and methods of the corresponding implementation to evaluate an expression and provide the run-time value for an associated control property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet (string expression, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet(string expression, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetExpressionEditorSheet (expression As String, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As ExpressionEditorSheet
public: override System::Web::UI::Design::ExpressionEditorSheet ^ GetExpressionEditorSheet(System::String ^ expression, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);

param.name: expression
param.span: 針對控制項屬性設定的運算式字串，用來初始化運算式編輯器工作表。

span.span: The expression string set for a control property, used to initialize the expression editor sheet.

param.span: expression 不包含 運算式前置字元。

span.span: expression does not include the expression prefix.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 服務提供者實作，由設計工具主應用程式 (Designer Host) 提供，可以用來取得額外的設計階段服務。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.

summary.span: 傳回應用程式設定運算式的運算式編輯器工作表。

span.span: Returns an expression editor sheet for an application setting expression.

returns.span: 實作，定義應用程式設定運算式屬性。

span.span: An implementation that defines the application setting expression properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回簡單的編輯器工作表的實作，其使用單一的輸入的字串的運算式。The method returns a simple editor sheet implementation, which uses a single input string to form the expression.
